abstract: Daimler, Audi, BMW, Porsche and Volkswagen are throwing their weight behind a standard plug and port design for future plug-in vehicles.
snippet: Daimler, Audi, BMW, Porsche and Volkswagen are throwing their weight behind a standard plug and port design for future plug-in vehicles.

headline.main: German Automakers Endorse a Unified Standard for D.C. Fast-Charging
